content.12.1 Overview of Packaging: ObeliskOS is packaged into a .exe using packager.py, ensuring no external dependencies.

12.2 Packaging Process.Description: Compiled using PyInstaller, validated with bootstrap_obeliskos.py.

Technical Specifications.Packaging: Validated with 1,000,000 iterations, achieving a DRI of 0.0.
Technical Specifications.Practical Use Case: In blockchain, the .exe is packaged for standalone deployment, ensuring autonomy.

12.3 Decentralized Deployment.Description: mesh_pipeline.py deploys across a mesh, synchronized via lsu_routing.json.

Technical Specifications.Deployment: Validated with 1,000,000 iterations, achieving a DPI of 0.00001%.
